        <description>Problem State constants, use these constants when determining which Problem State to use.

problemGr.update();</description>

	FIX_APPLIED: "fix_applied",
	RISK_ACCEPTED: "risk_accepted",

};

    initialize: function() {},
    type: 'ProblemStateSNC'
};]]></script>
